inventory.commentary: Revised PENN file combined groups 1 and 2, revised examples and definitions, added differentia. ahouston 26sep06, added dummy sense 2. ahouston

sense.name: A current member of a close-knit social group
sense.commentary: FAMILY[+role][+member][+current][+of_group][+social][+close_knit] Note: implies current, living members - in contrast to genetic ancestral affiliation Sense 3 Note: may include biological, marital or other types of social bond
sense.examples: He moved his family to Virginia. The dogs are treated as members of the family. Don't join that start-up unless you want to be part of a corporate family. The church welcomed new members into its family. He wanted to have a good job before starting a family. Tom's brother and wife have always treated us like family. He's family, he can sit in on this discussion. It was a family-operated business. A family of sparrows is living in a nest on my window ledge. (figurative?)

sense.name: biologically related ancestors or descendants
sense.commentary: FAMILY[+affiliation][+biological][+lineage][+ancestor/+descendant] people descended from a common ancestor Note: includes past generations of members - in contrast to Sense 1
sense.examples: The men in his family have all been over six feet tall for generations. The disease was linked genetically through his mother's family. He can trace his family back to the Mayflower.

sense.name: taxonomic relationship among abstract categories
sense.examples: The white oak is in the family 'Fagaceae'. We looked at color swatches mostly in the blue family. That mathematician is studying an interesting family of curved surfaces. Olive oil is in the family of unsaturated fats. The Right whale and Bow whale are in the same family. Mary has studied languages in the Germanic and Slavic families.

sense.name: The mob, gangsters, crime syndicate
sense.commentary: FAMILY[+organization][+criminal][+close_knit] organized crime Note: a specialized narrow usage of Sense 1
sense.examples: The family is known to run the local drug rings. They are the two major crime families in the city.
